body.name: ZAGG InvisibleShield Glass+ Screen Protector – High-Definition Tempered Glass Made for Apple iPhone 11 – Impact & Scratch Protection

features: Custom fit – ZAGG’s invisible shield glass screen protector is engineered to fit snugly on the apple iPhone; Designed meticulously, this screen protector offers a precise, case-friendly fit for today modern screens.
Smooth, silky feel – the precise fit of the ZAGG iPhone screen protector gives it a very smooth feel, allowing easy navigation of all the new features of the iPhone
Scratch and impact protection – The specially designed tempered glass is impact - and scratch-resistant, keeping the phone’s natural screen protected.
Smudge resistant – The oil-resistant and long-lasting screen is resistant to smudges, keeping it as clean as possible to improve your viewing experience.

Limited lifetime – If your Glass ever gets worn or damaged, we will replace it for as long as you own your device. (When installing the screen, please read the instructions very carefully or watch the video and install along with the example)
Compatibility: Made for the Apple iPhone 11 and iPhone Xr.
body.description: Two times stronger than most tempered glass, invisible Shield Glass+ features ion matrix technology - Premium impact and scratch protection that helps preserve every pixel. Crystal clear and easy to clean, glass+ Uses long-lasting, oil-resistant technology that prevents fingerprint smudges so you can enjoy HD clarity all day long. With the easiest application process on the market and a limited lifetime you can count on, invisible Shield Glass+ is the clearest choice for your device. A proprietary, All-Clear adhesive and meticulously-designed composition protects your iPhone 11 without sacrificing touch sensitivity or visibility. Patented EZ Apply tabs make applying your invisible Shield Easy and bubble-free. Our limited lifetime promises that if your Glass+ ever gets worn or damaged, we will replace it for as long as you own your device. Please read: when installing the screen, please read the instructions very carefully or watch the video and install along with the example. We also recommend having it professionally installed at any ZAGG location if preferred.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZAGG InvisibleShield Glass+ Screen Protector – high-Definition Tempered Glass Made for Apple iPhone 11 – Impact & Scratch Protection Description Glass Elite is the next step in the evolution of unbeatable glass screen protection. Ion exchange technology increases strength and durability. ClearPrint, an oil-diffusion treatment exclusive to InvisibleShield, makes fingerprints disappear from your screen. Re-engineered for Increased Strength and Durability InvisibleShield has reimagined what screen protection can do. Glass Elite is made with ion exchange technology and aluminosilicate glass. It’s our strongest glass screen protection to date. But we didn’t stop there. We’ve added ClearPrint, a revolutionary oil-diffusion technology that makes fingerprints virtually invisible.

Our Strongest Glass Screen Protection Ever The aluminosilicate glass used in Glass Elite undergoes an ion exchange tempering process which increases the surface tension of the glass making it stronger and more scratch-resistant. Glass Elite is our strongest glass screen protection ever. Reinforced Edges for Increased Protection The reinforced edges on Glass Elite protect the vulnerable corners and edges of your screen to prevent chips and stop cracks from starting and spreading. Breakthrough in Anti-Fingerprint Technology ClearPrint technology is a unique surface treatment—used exclusively by InvisibleShield— that hides the visibility of fingerprints on your screen protector. Developed by NBD Nanotechnologies, this oleophilic process spreads oils from fingerprints so thinly on the surface that it allows light to pass through the oil, making fingerprints virtually invisible. Easy Application Glass Elite screen protection has EZ Apply tabs and comes with an installation tray to ensure accurate alignment. We’ve also added a rubber install mat so you have a slip-proof surface to work on. Fast, Accurate, and Bubble-Free We believe installation should be as simple and accurate as possible, so we are constantly refining our processes with innovations like our EZ Apply technology and advanced adhesives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ZAGG InvisibleShield Glass+ Screen Protector offers dependable protection for my device. The installation process was straightforward, resulting in a clear and bubble-free shield. It effectively guards against scratches and smudges without compromising touch sensitivity. The oleophobic coating is a nice touch for keeping fingerprints in check. If you're looking for a reliable screen protector that gets the job done without any fuss, the Glass+ Screen Protector from ZAGG is a solid choice. Recommended for its practicality and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JUST BUY THIS
reviews.reviewText: I have used ZAGG brand glass screen protectors on all my iPhones dating back to the iPhone 5 lol. An associate at an AT&T store turned me on to them years ago and I have used them ever since. These particular screen protectors are great because they really do protect your phone. In the event of an extra hard drop, the screen protector may break but your phone screen stays in tact 99% of the time. Which is good because I don’t know about u, but I would prefer to spend $7-$20 to replace the screen protector rather than hundreds on a screen replacement or new phone. They really are durable, not the type to crack, scratch or break easily. When mine have broken, it has been due to real trauma to the phone, not your average everyday phone fumble. I also want to mention they are crystal clear quality glass so there’s no obstruction to view or quality of image unless u don’t clean the phone well enough b4 adhesion. Super easy to put on too, this ZAGG InvisibleShield Glass+ version has everything to clean the phone b4 application and a neat little tray to slide over the phone during application so u get the glass in exactly the right place every time. Easy peasy! I actually applied my last one kind of sloppily and there was an air bubble I wasn’t happy with. First time I ever had that issue. I tried to smooth it out but that didn’t work….HOWEVER, by the next day the air bubble had magically worked it’s way out on its own! It was completely gone! So don’t fret if a little air is caught between the glass and screen, it will go away with time.Long story short, this screen protector works and is well worth the price for the protection, quality and longevity you receive from it. I wouldn’t buy any other brand. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used this product for a few years, starting with my iPhone 5s. I drop my phone all the time, including on concrete, and it has always protected my screen. My last shield lasted me about 3 1/2 years until it cracked a bit on the bottom (due to all the phone dropping!) I did not replace, and my phone was still protected. Now that I have a new shield, my phone looks brand new again. I will always trust Zagg for my phone screen protection because it has never let me down. Installation is extremely simple - just ensure you have NO dust on the shield though or it will leave bubbles, but you can always take it off and try again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good protection for my SE
reviews.reviewText: I didn't read a bunch of reviews before buying this protector. I've used Zagg products before and found them very good. I'll touch on my experiences of what others see as shortcomings.Installation: I removed my old protector which had become chipped around the edges and had a single crack across the face. None affected the use of the phone. Purely cosmetic.After using the cloth to clean the screen and the dust tape, I put the guide in place, removed the film from the protector and set it in place after which it began to adhere to the phone. After it was in place, I removed the guide and used the cloth to rub and assure it was in place. No matter how diligently I had cleaned it, there appeared to be two small bubbles near one another that no amount of work could cause to go away. Now, after several days, I see no bubbles anywhere.Fit: Yes, this screen protector does not cover the curved screen completely. It is slightly smaller than the one it replaces. Perhaps this will make it less liable to chip on the edges and still be the primary contact spot while protecting the curved edges if dropped. I think so.Reviews: Let's face it, some people will never be satisfied and anything that isn't exactly perfect, must be someone else's fault.I guy a couple screen protectors at a time. The others I have are Ailen which are curved. I'll try them next.I like Zagg and Tech Armor usually but I'll try other products just for fun. It's only a few bucks.I should point out that I buy soft, clear phone covers that are very sleek and not those bulky, hard to get out of a pocket models so I'm not bothered by how the screen protector and phone cover clash.UPDATE:I'd like to update my review. I've now had this protector on the phone for quite a while and I've dropped it a couple times with not so much as a scratch. The bevel of the screen protector makes it much less likely to crack or chip, unlike any of the ones I've previously used on this and other phones.Gonna stick with this product.That last one I had (Forget the brand) promised the moon but it began to chip on the edges fairly quickly. I don't drop the phone that much but perhaps the chipping was from contact with change or keys in the pocket in which I had it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does what it should
reviews.reviewText: I purchase this product to protect my iphone's screen; I think this is the third one I've bought. Like most folks, I've dropped my phone a few times. The last time I dropped it, I actually cracked this screen cover, which surprised me - but better that than my phone screen.Installation is pretty easy, but this time the "frame" didn't sit on my phone very well; it was rather warped. That made it difficult to guesstimate placement.I know, I'm supposed to register it and get a free replacement - but I'd rather pay the price and keep my info to myself. No insult intended to the manufacturer; it's a very good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had these forever, they work well and last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my husbands iPhone, was very sturdy, great protection and also super easy to apply to phone screen. Highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewTitle: El mejor protector de pantalla disponible (mediocre)
reviews.reviewText: Es de fácil instalación, aunque debe asegurarse un ambiente libre de polvo. La sensación del material es buena y luce bien instalada. La calidad es mejor que cualquier otro protector de menor precio; pero la resistencia no es necesariamente mayor; es decir, el cristal se rompe con una caída a la altura de la mano. La única diferencia es que se quiebra en menos partes. Esta es la segunda ocasión que reemplazo el protector de cuatro ocasiones en total. Tuve un protector de pantalla que nunca se quebró en mi teléfono anterior, misma marca, pero la sensación al tacto era de menor calidad—plástico. Lo hubiera preferido a desperdiciar dinero en protectores de pantalla que no cumplen lo que dicen por ser baratos; así que, este caso es la mejor opción disponible en especie. La última opción sería proteger el celular con un estuche completo sacrificando la forma.

Excelente producto, no lo había pedido anteriormente porque el precio me parecía elevado y no había reseñas. Lo compre por recomendación de una amistad y no me arrepiento. Es fácil y perfecta su aplicación debido a que trae el accesorio que adjunte en imagen para marcar donde colocar el cristal, no quedan burbujas aunque no lo dejes caer uniforme, tiene un instructivo detallado así como lo necesario para limpiar la pantalla a profundidad (incluso un sticker para quitar pelusa).Mi parte favorita de la compra es que te dice como obtener garantía en caso de cualquier daño que sufra el cristal templado, si hubiera sabido eso antes lo hubiera pedido mucho tiempo atrás debido a que constantemente gastaba en cristales más baratos que aunque eran buenos se rompían al cabo de los meses.

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes this task easy to do.
reviews.reviewText: I will definitely buy again. A lot more affordable than buying at the phone stores. Great product, easy to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo compré para ponerlo sobre pantalla rota y funcionó
reviews.reviewText: Mi hija quebró la pantalla de su celular, solo un poco, lo cual es caro de repararLe puse este protector encima como un intento de poder solucionar el problema. Sin mucha esperanzaMi sorpresa fue que la fibra de vidrio se adhiere de una manera sorprendente en el dispositivo, funciona al 100% y la sensación al tocar el cristal es inigualableCompraré esta marca para mi teléfono también

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to apply and long lasting
